attributes.action: Debate the scientific research on the health and safety of 5g
attributes.additional_details:
There is conflicting information regarding the safety of 5g throughout europe and the western world. We would like parliament to research the effects of 5g on the health and wellbeing of humans and natural life.

Free from any of conflict of interests from members of parliament or communication company's involved in the roll out of the technology. 

There is scientific evidence that suggests it should be halted until research is completed
attributes.background: To hold an independent review on the health and safety on the health effects of EMF in the new 5g technologies currently being installed in the uk.
